#include "client.h"
#include "server.h"



namespace janus {

int ShardKvClient::Op(function<int(uint32_t*)> func) {
  uint64_t t1 = Time::now();
  while (true) {
    uint64_t t2 = Time::now();
    if (t2 - t1 > 10000000) {
      return KV_TIMEOUT;
    }
    //commo_
    uint32_t res=1;
    uint32_t ret = 0;
    int r1; 
    r1 = func(&ret);
     Log_info("leader gid %d and status %d",leader_idx_,r1);
    for(auto i:config.shard_group_map_){
      Log_info("%d %d",i.first,i.second);
    }


    if (r1 == ETIMEDOUT || ret == KV_TIMEOUT) {
      leader_idx_ = (leader_idx_+1) ;
      return KV_TIMEOUT;
    }
    if (ret == KV_SUCCESS) {
      return KV_SUCCESS;
    }
    if (ret == KV_NOTLEADER) {
      leader_idx_ = (leader_idx_+1) ;
    }
  }

}

int ShardKvClient::Put(const string& k, const string& v) {
  
  //rrr:Coroutine::Sleep(200*1000);
  uint32_t res=1;
  Log_info("put query");  
  while(res!=0){
    auto query=(ShardMasterProxy*) commo_->rpc_proxies_.at(leader_idx_%5);
    query->Query(1011111,&res,&config);
    rrr::Coroutine::Sleep(1000*1000);
    if(res==2)
      leader_idx_++;
  }
   int ser=config.shard_group_map_[std::stoi(k)];
    leader_idx_=ser*5;
  return Op([&](uint32_t* r)->int{
    Log_info("leader gid_ %d",leader_idx_);
    return Proxy(leader_idx_).Put(GetNextOpId(), k, v, r);
  });
}

ShardKvProxy& ShardKvClient::Proxy(siteid_t site_id) {
  verify(commo_);
  auto p = (ShardKvProxy*)commo_->rpc_proxies_.at(site_id);
  return *p; 
}

int ShardKvClient::Append(const string& k, const string& v) {
 
  //rrr:Coroutine::Sleep(200*1000);
  uint32_t res=1;
  Log_info("append query");
  while(res!=0){
    auto query=(ShardMasterProxy*) commo_->rpc_proxies_.at(leader_idx_%5);
    query->Query(1011111,&res,&config);
    rrr::Coroutine::Sleep(1000*1000);
    if(res==2)
      leader_idx_++;
  }
   int ser=config.shard_group_map_[std::stoi(k)];
    leader_idx_=ser*5;
  return Op([&](uint32_t* r)->int{


    return Proxy(leader_idx_).Append(GetNextOpId(), k, v, r);
  });
}

int ShardKvClient::Get(const string& k, string* v) {
  
  //rrr:Coroutine::Sleep(200*1000);
  uint32_t res=1;
  Log_info("get query");
  while(res!=0){
    auto query=(ShardMasterProxy*) commo_->rpc_proxies_.at(leader_idx_%5);
    query->Query(1011111,&res,&config);
    rrr::Coroutine::Sleep(1000*1000);
    if(res==2)
      leader_idx_++;
  }
   int ser=config.shard_group_map_[std::stoi(k)];
    leader_idx_=ser*5;
  return Op([&](uint32_t* r)->int{
    return Proxy(leader_idx_).Get(GetNextOpId(), k, r, v);
  });
}

} // namesapce janus;
